1: Shout joyfully to the Lord, all the earth.
2: Serve the Lord with gladness; Come before Him with joyful singing.
3: Know that the Lord [b]Himself is God; It is He who has made us, and [c]not we ourselves; We are His people and the sheep of His pasture.
4: Enter His gates with [d]thanksgiving And His courts with praise. Give thanks to Him, bless His name.
5: For the Lord is good; His lovingkindness is everlasting And His faithfulness to all generations.
